azureLogAnalytics.query:
AppRequests
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| extend  AppRoleName = replace_string(AppRoleName, "-staging", "")
| parse _ResourceId with "/subscriptions/" subscriptionId "/resourcegroups/" resourcegroups "/providers/microsoft.insights/components/" appInsights
| where $__contains(appInsights, $AppInsight)
| where $__contains(AppRoleName, $App) 
| where AppRoleName != "" and Url != "" and Name !startswith "HEAD " and Name !startswith "OPTIONS " and ResultCode != 404 and ResultCode != "" and ResultCode !startswith "30" and  Name !in ("GET /healthcheck", "GET /", "GET /Error", "GET Home/Index", "GET /index.html", "GET /favicon.ico")
| extend success_int = case(Success, 1, 0)
| summarize percentiles(DurationMs, 50, 90, 95, 99, 99.9), Success=sum(success_int), Count=count()
| extend Errors=Count-Success, SuccessPercent = round(Success/todouble(Count), 4), P50=percentile_DurationMs_50, P90=percentile_DurationMs_90, P95=percentile_DurationMs_95, P99=percentile_DurationMs_99 , P999=percentile_DurationMs_99_9
| project-away percentile_DurationMs_95, percentile_DurationMs_90, percentile_DurationMs_50, percentile_DurationMs_99, percentile_DurationMs_99_9
| order by Count desc

AppRequests
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| extend  AppRoleName = replace_string(AppRoleName, "-staging", "")
| parse _ResourceId with "/subscriptions/" subscriptionId "/resourcegroups/" resourcegroups "/providers/microsoft.insights/components/" appInsights
| where $__contains(appInsights, $AppInsight)
| where $__contains(AppRoleName, $App) 
| where AppRoleName != "" and Url != "" and Name !startswith "HEAD " and Name !startswith "OPTIONS " and ResultCode != 404 and ResultCode != "" and ResultCode !startswith "30" and  Name !in ("GET /healthcheck" "GET /" "GET /Error" "GET Home/Index" "GET /index.html" "GET /favicon.ico")
| extend success_int = case(Success, 1, 0)
| summarize percentiles(DurationMs, 50, 90, 95, 99), Success=sum(success_int), Count=count() by TimeGenerated=bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval)
| extend Errors=Count-Success, P50=percentile_DurationMs_50, P90=percentile_DurationMs_90, P95=percentile_DurationMs_95, P99=percentile_DurationMs_99
| project-away percentile_DurationMs_95, percentile_DurationMs_90, percentile_DurationMs_50, percentile_DurationMs_99, Count, Errors, Success
| order by TimeGenerated asc

AppRequests
| extend  AppRoleName = replace_string(AppRoleName, "-staging", "")
| parse _ResourceId with "/subscriptions/" subscriptionId "/resourcegroups/" resourcegroups "/providers/microsoft.insights/components/" appInsights
| where $__contains(appInsights, $AppInsight)
| where $__contains(AppRoleName, $App) 
| where AppRoleName != "" 
| extend AppVersion = case(AppVersion in ("1.0.0.1", "1.0.0.0", "5.0.10", "3.1", "6.0.3"), "", AppVersion)
| summarize FirstRequest=min(TimeGenerated) by AppVersion, AppRoleName
| where $__timeFilter(FirstRequest)
| extend Release = 1
| order by FirstRequest asc

AppRequests
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| extend  AppRoleName = replace_string(AppRoleName, "-staging", "")
| parse _ResourceId with "/subscriptions/" subscriptionId "/resourcegroups/" resourcegroups "/providers/microsoft.insights/components/" appInsights
| where $__contains(appInsights, $AppInsight)
| where $__contains(AppRoleName, $App) 
| where AppRoleName != "" and Url != "" and Name !startswith "HEAD " and Name !startswith "OPTIONS " and ResultCode != 404 and ResultCode != "" and ResultCode !startswith "30" and  Name !in ("GET /healthcheck" "GET /" "GET /Error" "GET Home/Index" "GET /index.html" "GET /favicon.ico")
| extend success_int = case(Success, 1, 0)
| summarize Success=sum(success_int), Count=count() by TimeGenerated=bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval)
| extend Errors=Count-Success
| order by TimeGenerated asc

AppRequests
| extend  AppRoleName = replace_string(AppRoleName, "-staging", "")
| parse _ResourceId with "/subscriptions/" subscriptionId "/resourcegroups/" resourcegroups "/providers/microsoft.insights/components/" appInsights
| where $__contains(appInsights, $AppInsight)
| where $__contains(AppRoleName, $App) 
| where AppRoleName != "" 
| extend AppVersion = case(AppVersion in ("1.0.0.1", "1.0.0.0", "5.0.10", "3.1", "6.0.3"), "", AppVersion)
| summarize FirstRequest=min(TimeGenerated) by AppVersion, AppRoleName
| where $__timeFilter(FirstRequest)
| extend Release = 1
| order by FirstRequest asc

AppRequests
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| extend  AppRoleName = replace_string(AppRoleName, "-staging", "")
| parse _ResourceId with "/subscriptions/" subscriptionId "/resourcegroups/" resourcegroups "/providers/microsoft.insights/components/" appInsights
| where $__contains(appInsights, $AppInsight)
| where $__contains(AppRoleName, $App) 
| where AppRoleName != "" and Url != "" and Name !startswith "HEAD " and Name !startswith "OPTIONS " and ResultCode != 404 and ResultCode != "" and ResultCode !startswith "30" and  Name !in ("GET /healthcheck", "GET /", "GET /Error", "GET Home/Index", "GET /index.html", "GET /favicon.ico")
| extend success_int = case(Success, 1, 0)
| extend AppVersion = case(AppVersion in ("1.0.0.1", "1.0.0.0", "5.0.10", "3.1", "6.0.3"), "", AppVersion)
| summarize Versions=make_set_if(AppVersion, AppVersion != ""),  percentiles(DurationMs, 50, 90, 95, 99), Success=sum(success_int), Count=count() by AppRoleName, appInsights
| extend AppInsights=appInsights, Errors=Count-Success, SuccessPercent = round(Success/todouble(Count), 4), P50=percentile_DurationMs_50, P90=percentile_DurationMs_90, P95=percentile_DurationMs_95, P99=percentile_DurationMs_99
| project-away percentile_DurationMs_95, percentile_DurationMs_90, percentile_DurationMs_50, percentile_DurationMs_99,appInsights
| order by Count desc

AppRequests
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| extend  AppRoleName = replace_string(AppRoleName, "-staging", "")
| parse _ResourceId with "/subscriptions/" subscriptionId "/resourcegroups/" resourcegroups "/providers/microsoft.insights/components/" appInsights
| where $__contains(appInsights, $AppInsight)
| where $__contains(AppRoleName, $App) 
| where AppRoleName != "" and Url == ""
| extend success_int = case(Success, 1, 0)
| extend AppVersion = case(AppVersion in ("1.0.0.1", "1.0.0.0", "5.0.10", "3.1", "6.0.3"), "", AppVersion)
| summarize Versions=make_set_if(AppVersion, AppVersion != ""),  percentiles(DurationMs, 50, 90, 95, 99), Success=sum(success_int), Count=count() by AppRoleName, appInsights
| extend AppInsights=appInsights, Errors=Count-Success, SuccessPercent = (Success/todouble(Count)) * 100, P50=percentile_DurationMs_50, P90=percentile_DurationMs_90, P95=percentile_DurationMs_95, P99=percentile_DurationMs_99
| project-away percentile_DurationMs_95, percentile_DurationMs_90, percentile_DurationMs_50, percentile_DurationMs_99,appInsights
| order by Count desc

KubePodInventory
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where Namespace == "$Namespace"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
| project Name, ContainerName, ServiceName
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
    | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
    | where CounterName == 'memoryWorkingSetBytes'    
    | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
    | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
    | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
    | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
    | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, CounterValue
) on ContainerName
| summarize MemoryWorkingSet=avg(CounterValue) by TimeGenerated=bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), ServiceName
| order by TimeGenerated asc

panels.title: Deployment Memory Working Set (Avg Per Pod)

azureLogAnalytics.query:
KubePodInventory
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where Namespace == "$Namespace"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
| project Name, ContainerName, ServiceName
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
    | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
    | where CounterName == 'cpuUsageNanoCores'
    | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
    | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
    | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
    | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
    | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, CounterValue
) on ContainerName
| summarize MiliCores=avg((CounterValue / 1000000)) by TimeGenerated=bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), ServiceName
| order by TimeGenerated asc

AppRequests
| parse _ResourceId with "/subscriptions/" subscriptionId "/resourcegroups/" resourcegroups "/providers/microsoft.insights/components/" appInsights
| where appInsights != "" and resourcegroups contains "$ResourceGroup"
| summarize by appInsights
| order by appInsights asc

AppRequests
| where AppRoleName != ""
| parse _ResourceId with "/subscriptions/" subscriptionId "/resourcegroups/" resourcegroups "/providers/microsoft.insights/components/" appInsights
| where $__contains(appInsights, $AppInsight)
| summarize by AppRoleName
| order by AppRoleName asc
workspace("$Workspace").KubePodInventory | summarize by Namespace | project Namespace
